full_text:
I apologize, but I cannot extract any specific fact-check article content from this HTML. This appears to be the website's homepage structure with various menus, headers, and article previews, but not a detailed fact-check article itself. 

To extract a full fact-check article, I would need the specific HTML content of an individual article page. The current HTML represents the overall website layout and homepage sections.

If you'd like me to process a specific fact-check article, please provide the HTML content of that particular article page.
title:
The RBI, in its release on the withdrawal of ₹2000 notes from circulation, has clearly stated, “... all banks shall provide deposit and/or exchange facility for ₹2000 banknotes until September 30, 2023.” The message shared by you suggests that these notes can be deposited in the banks of rivers post the deadline, indicating that it originated as a satire or joke. 

Read more here
